description: Made for day-in-day out pursuits, from work to cragging, the Mantle Short is built with a classic 5-pocket design and made from durable organic cotton canvas fabric with a touch of stretch. A gusseted inseam provides plenty of mobility. Features include two front hand pockets, two rear drop-in pockets, a right thigh zip pocket, and a belt loop waist band with a button zip fly closure.
name: Black Diamond Mantle Shorts - Mens
